title: Trump said he'd fall if he showed reasons for losing Hillary?
subtitle: The statement by Donald Trump, "Meet the press," which lasted nine months for the main election to the election campaign, was misleadingly applied to the presidential race in August 2016.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: In an interview with the press, Donald Trump said that he would give up the presidential race if polls showed that he had lost in front of Hillary Clinton.
